formula: a(n) = b(n-1), where b(n) = 1 if n = 0, otherwise 2*b(floor(n/2)) + 1 - n mod 2. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 19 2003
a(1) = 1; for n > 1, a(2n-1) = 2*a(n) + 1; for n >= 1, a(2n) = 2*a(n). - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 29 2004
